::JetV/Crotale::
JetV hears the comm from PAcifix and replies.
"PAcifix the ship is through preliminary checks and is ready for take
off.  I am here with a couple others that have arrived."

Crotale sits silently in a weapon container on the ship.
--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Well.... I'm going away again, but not for camping. This time
> I am leaving to participate in a national level music competition. I'll
> be gone from wednesday (23) till late sunday (27th) night.
>
> Jer will be posting for my Decepticons, Gunthers can cover my
> Chivitrons. I'm not sure what will happen to the Autobots for a while.
>
> --- Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop / Ikoto ---
>
> Pacifix nods to Ironhide, and exits the Council room, knowing that
> the meeting was adjourned. Pacifix walked outside, and stretched
> knowing that this would be his last day on the planet he had called
> home for so many years. "Ok." He opened an encrypted commlink
> to all Autobots who were going on the mission. (Crossroads, JetV,
> Artemis, Gold bug, Jazz, Metalwarhawk, Technobots, Hoist -- the
> 'old friend' that Ironhide sent, Trailblazer, Grimlock, Swoop, Slag,
> Snarl, Sludge, and any other Autobots that I haven't mentioned)
> "All Autobots that are going to participate in this cruitial mission of
> secrecy, please report to the hidden Autobots shuttle, and wait
> there for me to arrive. Pacifix out." Pacifix transforms into APC
> mode and heads out towards his quarters to collect his stuff.
>
> Swoop transforms into pterodactyl mode, and flies out towards the
> launch site.
>
> Crossroads gets the message while he was approaching the
> launch site for the ship. He aririve at the entrance, and hops into it,
> appearing at the bottom. He walks around the ship, finds a crate to
> site on, moves it to the large open area which Pacifix would
> probably use for his farwell speech. He sits down on the crate
> waiting for Pacifix.
>
>
>
> On 18 May 2001, at 8:08, robertdahl wrote:
>
> > Ironhide frowned at how this had degenerated. But he knew everyone in
> > the council would be happy to see the Dinobots leave. He looked down
> > at Pacifix, "I also want to send an old friend of mine" he said. "Take
> > the Technobots as well, they have always wanted to go and explore
> > other planets, and their technology will be of great help" he said
> > looking down at Pacifix.
> >
> >
> >

> >
> >
